Package meka.experiment.evaluationstatistics

Interface EvaluationStatisticsHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LogSupporter, weka.core.OptionHandler, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler, IncrementalEvaluationStatisticsHandler, OptionalIncrementalEvaluationStatisticsHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEvaluationStatisticsHandler, AbstractFileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler, InMemory, KeyValuePairs, Serialized

    public interface EvaluationStatisticsHandler
extends weka.core.OptionHandler, Serializable, LogSupporter
    Interface for classes that load and save collected EvaluationStatistics in some form.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
